subtitle.text: An innovative tool for future companies and organization
subtitle.description: Description below the main page title

video_embed_url_1.description: Youtube video url must be in format: https://www.youtube.com/embed/tpiyEe_CqB4 where the last part is the video id

video_embed_url_2.description: Youtube video url must be in format: https://www.youtube.com/embed/tpiyEe_CqB4 where the last part is the video id

download_video_instruction.text: If the video doesn't play on your browser, you can download it.

rules_welcome.description: Small text above the section title

rules_title.text: Easy to follow and fun to answer

rule_1_text.text: In the first phase you are asked to map yourself inside the organisation. After that you will find themed statements or questions about typical scenes at work.

rule_2_text.text: The viewpoints are yourself, your team and the whole organisation. If not otherwise specified in the statement, please use yourself as the viewpoint.

rule_3_text.text: It will take less than 20 minutes to indicate your opinion on the tool. After that you will be able to review your own and other’s answers and that’s when you get to participate within your community.

parameters_page_description.text: Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Map yourself to your organisation.

privacy_policy_checkbox_label.text: I agree and consent to the
privacy_policy_checkbox_label.description: Accept privacy policy checkbox text part 1

privacy_policy_link.description: Accept privacy policy checkbox text part 2 (this is a link which opens the privacy policy)

confirm_leave_text.text: After submitting your selection you will not be able to change your parameters, are you sure you wish to continue ?

privacy_policy_title.description: Privacy policy popup title (also on landing page)

privacy_policy_text.text: Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Map yourself to your organisation.
privacy_policy_text.description: Privacy policy popup text(also on landing page)

accept.description: Privacy policy popup: accept button text

mobile_theme_title.description: Only visible on mobile. Above the theme title and after it is the theme number

hearts_label.description: Small instruction text below the hearts where you select importance

question_importance.text: How important is this issue to you?

unacceptable.description: NOT USED ATM. This is defined in the question.

excellent.description: NOT USED ATM. This is defined in the question.

no_concern.description: Label for 'Does not concern me' checkbox

make_public.description: Label for checkbox in an open question (If you want to make the answer public).

heading_title.description: Used also in Aftergame invitation. Only English version is used!

heading_paragraph.text: Come along, join our network of business builders - let’s start building our future organisation!
heading_paragraph.description: Used also in Aftergame invitation. Only English version is used!

invitation_button.description: Used also in Aftergame invitation. Only English version is used!

overview_description.text: Please find the survey result below and your own answers compared to your reference groups.

overview_late_title.description: Shown if user is late to survey

overview_late_description.text: Please ask the facilitator to grant you access to see the results.
overview_late_description.description: Shown if user is late to survey

dashboard_section_vai_title.text: KPI: we as strategy-driven networked team

dashboard_section_vai_description.text: This indicator summarizes on how close we are to achieving our vision of strategy-driven teams with the capability to operate successfully in a networked business context

dashboard_section_themes_title.text: Our 5 building blocks and their current state

dashboard_section_themes_description.text: For each building block, we have identified three development drivers, this is their current state.

dashboard_section_drivers_title.text: Our development drivers and their current state

dashboard_section_drivers_description.text: For each building block, we have identified three development drivers, this is their current state.

dashboard_section_statements_title.text: The statements and their current state

dashboard_section_statements_description.text: For each building block, we have identified a number of statements describing the target state of how it should be visible in practice. These are the top 5 and bottom 5 rated statements.

top_5_statements_by_result.text: TOP 5 statements by current state (‘closest to our vision’)

bottom_5_statements_by_result.text: BOTTOM 5 statements by current state (‘furthest away from our vision’)

themes.description: Navigation link text, also used in titles

drivers.description: Navigation link text, also used in titles

statements.description: Navigation link text, also used in titles

open_answers.description: Navigation link text, also used in titles

statistics_title.description: The title for the statistics section pages when aftergame is ON

your_statistics_title.description: The title for the statistics section pages when aftergame is OFF

your_statistics_description.text: Thanks for participating, you can checkout your results below. You'll get an email notification to join the aftergame once enough users have answered the survey.
your_statistics_description.description: The description for the statistics section pages when aftergame is OFF

does_not_concern.description: Shown in statement result bars (Does not concern me X/X)

hidden_from_public.description: Small info label for an open question answer

no_open_answers.description: Shown when there are no open answers

no_public_answers.description: Shown when there are no public answers

no_results_for_parameter.description: Shown when there are no results to show for a parameter

discussion_description.text: Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet
discussion_description.description: Description below the main title. 1 short sentence.

more_answers.description: (X more answers) Button to show more answers

reply_button.description: Button text: reply to an answer

delete_answer_modal_content.text: All replies to this answer will also be deleted.

active_topic.description: Label to indicate that the topic is active

closed_topic.description: Label to indicate that the topic is closed

no_answers_yet.text: No answers yet. Be the first to answer!
no_answers_yet.description: Text indicating that there are no answers yet.

no_answers_yet_guest_user.description: Same as above but for a guest user who can't answer.

submit_answer_screenreader_text.description: Screen readers only! Submit answer button text.
